title: Add More Measurable Achievements
description: Include concrete numbers and results to better showcase your impact.

title: Use Action Verbs
description: Start bullet points with verbs like 'Implemented', 'Developed', or 'Led'.

title: Keep It Concise
description: Limit resume to 1 page if under 5 years experience.

title: Include Job Keywords
description: Match keywords from job descriptions to improve ATS compatibility.
